program_description: Most sections require the use of a computer with Internet access for class resources and/or to complete assignments.

courses.description: This course introduces the students to basic vocabulary and fundamental sentence structures in the present and past. Pronunciation, grammar and everyday vocabulary are stressed as indispensable tools for comprehension and expression. French customs, culture and everyday life are also highlighted. The course is taught in French except in cases of linguistic difficulty as determined by the professor.

notes: Above section 2316 is a hybrid class taught on campus and online via the Internet. For additional information, go to smc.edu/OnlineEd.
Above section 4107 requires students to use a camera and microphone for video proctoring during quizzes and exams. Above section modality is Scheduled.

courses.advisory_notes: *The advisory for this course is comparable to two years of high school French
courses.description: This course completes the basics of the language further stressing pronunciation, grammar and everyday vocabulary as indispensable tools for comprehension. It also includes simplified readings highlighting French customs, culture, and everyday life. This course is taught in French except in cases of linguistic difficulty as determined by the professor. .

notes: Above section 2317 requires students to use a camera and microphone for video proctoring during quizzes and exams. Above section modality is Scheduled.
Above section 2318 is a hybrid class taught on campus and online via the Internet. For additional information, go to smc.edu/OnlineEd.

courses.advisory_notes: *The advisory for this course is comparable to three years of high school French
courses.description: This course reviews French grammar emphasizing idiomatic construction and expressions. Discussions are based on selected readings from contemporary French literature. The course is taught in French except in cases of linguistic difficulty as determined by the professor. .

notes: Above section 2319 is a hybrid class taught on campus and online via the Internet. For additional information, go to smc.edu/OnlineEd.
